QuestData.Title: An Impactful Discovery
QuestData.Description: <Thargad rummages through the satchel and pulls out a curious object.>$b$bWell now, this is odd... it's a hollow kodo horn with some sort of potion inside.$b$b<Thargad sniffs the potion.>$b$bWHEW! Definitely not any kind of healthy elixir. This mess is meant for one thing... killin'.$b$bHow 'bout yeh run it back up to Karnum and see if there's anything he can do with it...
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Mysterious Concoction to Karnum at Karnum's Glade.
QuestData.RewardText: <Karnum examines the concoction.>$b$bYes, $c. Not only do I know what this is, I know just how you should use it....
